name: RaptorGB
description:
Please note this project is still a work in progress. 

RaptorGB is a Gameboy demake of a MSDOS Game called Raptor Call of the Shadows that me and Scott Bloom are working on with the original creator Scott Hosts approval and permission. 

Developed using GBDK.

It's Gameboy Color Compatible but can run on a DMG. 

Its planned to be open source upon completion.
